nodes.text: Thinner Prokov was a criminal hired by Gallandro to participate in the Varcinius Repository vault job. Their job was to put rumors out on the communication networks that there was a large criminal market for artisanal gasses. This, along with a theft arranged by Gallandro, caused the staff of the Varcinius Repository to rotate a hexvault so that a collection of gasses would be in a more secure position. This lead to the vault with the actual target to be rotated to a lower security outer zone.
